definition: to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join

sentences.english: So, collaboratively filter and recommend or die?
sentences.chinese: 那么，协同过滤和推荐会消失？

sentences.english: The cooperative networking may be of various forms and involve multiple key technologies.
sentences.chinese: 多网协同具有多种形态，涉及多项核心技术。

sentences.english: The nature of modern war is highly distributed coordination.
sentences.chinese: 现代战争的特点是高度的分布式协同作战。

sentences.english: Design of a Collaborative Knowledge Management System Framework …
sentences.chinese: 协同式知识管理系统架构之设计。

sentences.english: The coevolution between life and the earth's environment is the core of geobiology.
sentences.chinese: 生命与地球环境的协同演化是地球生物学的核心。

sentences.english: So, the dimension constraints in 3D can be consilient with graphs in 2D.
sentences.chinese: 协同了尺寸三维约束与二维图形在维数上的不一致。

sentences.english: Cooperation is a main characteristic of CSCW.
With the move from manoeuvre to trench warfare, both the infantry and the artillery had to learn how to work together.
sentences.chinese: 由演习过渡到阵地战，步兵和炮兵也需学会协同作战。

sentences.english: The nitrogen grave sour thorn incites thrusts out the island element secretion and the glucose stimulation has the synergism.
sentences.chinese: 氮墓酸刺滋腆岛素分泌与葡萄糖的刺激有协同作用。

sentences.english: Next I'll describe how the components of the search application work together.
sentences.chinese: 接下来我将介绍搜索应用程序的组件如何协同工作。

sentences.english: Stops all coroutines running on this behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 停止所有动作的协同程序。

sentences.english: This is the biblical model and would fall under the doctrine of concurrence .
sentences.chinese: 这是圣经的模式，也是落在协同运作的教义范畴内的。

sentences.english: In the non-cooperative communication environment, the receiver can not acquire any training data.
sentences.chinese: 而在非协同通信环境中，接收方无法获得辅助数据。

sentences.english: Furazolidone and carbenoxolone showed synergistic effects on the pyloric ligation model.
sentences.chinese: 呋喃唑酮和生胃酮对幽门结扎模型的保护有协同作用。

sentences.english: Unified product model is the basis of NCPD realization.
sentences.chinese: 建立统一定义的产品模型是实现协同开发的基础。

sentences.english: To establish innovation-driven and cooperation-competition mechanism of is the key to promote the collaborative development of reverse engineering, technology innovation and intellectua…
sentences.chinese: 建立创新导向和竞合机制是三者协同发展的关键。

definition: to dispatch (vehicles, staff etc)/to schedule/to manage/dispatcher/scheduler
to coordinate closely/to act in close partnership with
to join forces/to give full cooperation
to coordinate/to harmonize/to fit together/to match (colors etc)/harmonious/concerted
to impel/to carry forward/to push on/to advance/to drive forward
